CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. A11 reads: "At B-P Women's Breakfast - Two prominent citizens were cited by the Pittsburgh Business and Professional Women, at their third annual Founders Day breakfast, last Sunday, at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton...In the second photo, Mrs. Ruby Hord, left, presents a certificate of merit to William S. Howell, the group's "Man of the Year," while Mrs. Lenore Rainey, president of the sponsoring organization, and MRs. Daisy E. Lampkin, toast mistress, look on. - Harris PHotos."
TitMainTitle: Ruby Hord presenting certificate of merit to William S. Howell, with Lenore Rainey and Daisy E. Lampkin looking on, in Penn Sheraton Hotel for Pittsburgh Business and Professional Women's third annual Founders Day breakfast
